items.sentence: May I ask why you didn't do what we asked you to do?
You're one of the only people I know here in Boston.
My coworker really knows how to suck up to the boss.
I'd never expected to meet Tom in a place like that.
You never told me that you went to Boston last year.
These are the new books and those are the old books.
The loss will amount to one hundred million dollars.
Fallen rocks cut off the only access to the village.
What's bad for your enemy isn't always good for you.
Tom and Mary still live next door to John and Alice.
